metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31607 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In SaltStack Salt 2016.9 through 3002.6, a command injection vulnerability exists in the snapper module that allows for local privilege escalation on a minion. The attack requires that a file is created with a pathname that is backed up by snapper, and that the master calls the snapper.diff function (which executes popen unsafely).

criterions.comment: salt package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
